title: How Good Is Christian Entertainment for Wedding Reception and Spiritual Retreat? (Mr David Wilson)
text: By Mr David Wilson Oct 1, 2015 Wedding is the most important day in the life of any individual. There is no one who will not turn every stone to make the wedding ceremony and wedding reception a memorable one. Wedding ceremonies are touching, heartfelt and often pretty serious. An earnest ceremony followed by a really exciting wedding reception make the entire episode of wedding perfect.If the wedding is a Christian marriage, the bride and groom can provide an engaging Christian Entertainment to the guests. However, it should be taken care that the entertainment should be suitable for the religious beliefs of the guests.A Christian Comedian, band, disc jockey or a dance troupe can be hired for performing at the wedding reception. The entertainers should provide suitable content and avoid profanity. The costumes should be chosen in such a manner that it leaves little to dark humor and imagination. A band which performs Christian music is good for hiring at wedding receptions.Light hearted wedding reception games which can be played with the guests will keep the guests engaged and entertained. Popular games that are appropriate for a Christian event include G-rated trivia regarding the bride and groom, musical chairs and dance competitions.The bride and groom can have a chocolate fountain for the wedding reception. They can either buy it or rent it. Guests who have a sweet tooth and especially children will love it like anything. They will thoroughly enjoy dipping different kinds of food, such as strawberry and pineapple chunks into the chocolate and have it.Fireworks show will take guests by awe. If the wedding budget permits, a firework company may be hired. Having a photo booth at the wedding reception is also a unique way to entertain the guests. Photo lovers will love this concept. Guests can take the pictures, which print instantly, home with them.Having Christian Magician at the reception is also quite entertaining. There are several magicians who do magic centering the bride and the groom.Apart from wedding receptions, Christian entertainers are very much in demand in church retreat for children. Children love to see magic. It is true that getting ideas for church retreat for children is tough but a little research can make the task lot easier. Shopping from a Christian bookstore some inexpensive yet interesting books is a good option. It can be easily incorporated into the retreat's spiritual theme. The book stores also have various items based on Christian themes. One can buy these items and can hide them in various places of the camp but within a limited area. After hiding, one can ask the children to find those items.Kids swear by movies. "The Ten Commandments," "The Robe", and "Ben-Hur" are some of the classic Bible movies. It is really surprising to note how interested kids will be in these old classics, and how the movies can bolster Bible studies by reinforcing visually what children are studying.Crafts and cooking can also be included as a theme. The children may be asked to make various items related to Christian theme. There are many items that can be made such as Santa Claus, Christmas tree, paper balls, stars, and many more. Preparing some delicacies will also fill them up with excitement. About the Author David Wilson is a Christian Magician and author who tours nationally performing at various states. He also owns a Christian Entertainment company and is a regular columnist at Magicurt. Rating:
